|——|—————| | Time | Activity | |——|—————| | 7:30am | Breakfast and Presentations | | 8:50am | Summary of Day 1 and Plan for Day 2 | | 9:00am | Session 3: Design for Resilience in Space-based Systems | | 10:00am | Q & A Session | | 10:20am | Break | | 10:40am | Session 4: Modular Coupled Virtual Testbed and Digital Twin Build-out and Utilization | | 12:00pm | Summary and Closing Session | | | “Expanding the Vision of Science and Engineering to Achieve Resilient Long-Term Extraterrestrial Habitasts” | | | Moderator: Dan Dumbacher, Executive Director, American Institute of Aeronautics & Astronautics (AIAA) | | 1:00pm | Lunch |
